The sub-standard double glazing did nothing to keep the noise of passing cars out. If we hadn't have arrived late in the evening and were due to leave the following day I would have complained. We ate in the Asian brassery, which was buffet style food. All that I can say is that the food was OK, but nothing special and indeed quite bland. Another reviewer has noted the cost of the internet charges - simply crazy. The staff were friendly and helpful, so no complaints there. I am sure that we will go back to Singapore to explore it further. Would I consider paying to stay here - no chance. There is a rumour that the hotel is 5* but I am not sure on whose standard?!

Reviews.Title: “over priced!!!”
Reviews.Author: izzle_snizzle
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel but not in walking distance of orchard road. There is however a shuttle bus but you have book in advance to get on it. Rooms clean and spacious. Staff well presented and professional. My main problem was how expensive it was! $11.84 SGD dollars for 30 mins on the internet- what a ripoff! Compared to what i paid in australia later on $2 AUD for 30 mins, it was well overpriced! Also, the hotel is right by a busy highway, so when sitting at the pool it is quite noisy. Didnt hear any noise from the room though. Apart from that, the hotel is ok but just ok. You have to get taxis everywhere, unless you like a long walk.

Reviews.Title: “Great Singapore stopover”
Reviews.Author: Phil404nz
Reviews.Content: A bit worried on our return trip from the UK to New Zealand due to location of Hotel away from the main centre. No problems here with the hotel shuttle coach free and taxis so cheap S$6 to Orchard Road. The room and facilities are of a good standard for this hotel rating. Meals at the Cafe / Restaurant were excellent value and staff were more than helpful as per everyone in Singapore. We would not hesitate to book here again. Botanical gardens very close and well worth the visit. Tours easily available ex the hotel lobby. Great visit 04/2008

Reviews.Title: “The Good, The Bad & The Ugly”
Reviews.Author: bassbin
Reviews.Content: This was the second time my wife and I stayed at this hotel (July 2005 and Jan 2008). Both times our original room was smelly, small, old, dirty and mouldy (basic superior room). We complained both times and without too much fuss we got upgraded within 15 - 30 minutes to a larger modern room with a balcony (the second time we booked we thought we would need to do this - and we were right). These rooms in the Plymouth wing are much better - larger, LCD TV, balcony, good furniture and reasonably clean / mould free (but also more expensive if you book them before arriving). People should realise that this is a old hotel and it shows in many areas. Pool / gym area is clean and tidy; however, pool is old and dirty / missing tiles (also next to busy road so smelly). Lobby is great / modern, but then again you don't sleep in the lobby. Breakfast was OK, only basic choices and overall dining area looks tired / chairs dirty. Hotel has self service washing and drying facilities which can come in handy. Didn't use internet (I’m on holiday!). Hotel is having some work done on it so who knows things may get better. We booked our accommodation via a wholesaler so at AU$120.00 per night it was very cheap for Singapore. Hotel is away from the main shopping and entertainment areas so you will need to take a taxi (approx S$6.00 to Orchid Rd) or make use of the free shuttle bus which the hotel operates. We used taxis as they are cheap and one always seems to be waiting outside hotel. One of the few benefits nobody yet has mentioned on this site is the hotel's proximity to the Adams Road Hawker Centre (approx 500m down the road - walking distance). We ate there most nights on both occasions we stayed at this hotel (didn't bother with hotel for dinner). It has a fantastic range of food and 90% of the stalls have an "A" government rating (dinner will cost you S$2.50 - S$5.00) and beer and fresh fruit juice is available. I recommend this spot if you fancy getting amongst it with the locals for a bite to eat (it’s very popular and has a great buzz). So overall do your research and get yourself a cheap rate and be prepared to complain if they give you a dodgy room.

Reviews.Title: “filthy hotel”
Reviews.Author: yorkieLeeds
Reviews.Content: Pleas please don`t book this hotel, we booked it as a stopover and the place is nasty. Our room was at the back of the hotel facing trees, so it was very dark, there were little ants running all over the tea making area. We thought the sheet on the bed had stains on it but we found out that it was the mattress protector that was covered in pee and blood stains. The room smelled really bad, the toilet leaked it was the worst hotel I`ve ever stopped in. The other thing is its on a main road and not a thing is close by. My travel agent booked this hotel for us because of the price and I booked the carlton which was fantastic. I ,am not to fussy but I like a clean room and this was very far from clean. When I complained they said they would look into it, but i got no appology.If i was you i would book for somewhere else, I swear by this website thats why I took the time to fill in this review.

Reviews.Title: “A good value for money hotel”
Reviews.Author: MitziKent
Reviews.Content: I had read some reviews saying this place wasn't great. We had two rooms and both were clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly, there is a shuttle bus into town, cabs were available and the coffee shop was good. It was also great that they had two self-service washing machines and driers.

Reviews.Title: “Good service”
Reviews.Author: Patricia_Lye
Reviews.Content: I have read some review from other people regarding on this Hotel. Most of them said the room is smelly for smoking room. Yes, I have agree it is a bit smelly but I believe you can request to change upon your check-in process. They do have spray some sort of air-freshener to the room and its works. I follow with about 9 persons (oopps, we should not do so) with 2 link rooms. It is quite small if you divide 5 , 4 into each room. The bed can either be queen or Single bed x2. As I said, you may also changed it upon check-in process. The toilet is okay. I have also read some negative reviews of the hotel regards their dirty or unfurnish shower room. For our 2 rooms, we find it is okie. For broadband user, this is still okie. You may purchase SG$25 for 24 hrs access in your room. Note, you may have low traffic connection depends on the location of your room.

Reviews.Title: “Bad value for your money”
Reviews.Author: nivfitz
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed with this hotel considering the amount of money I spent on it. The staff were really lovely and very helpful, but the rooms left something to be desired. My bed was ENORMOUS and the pillows were big and fluffy (which I loved) but the room needed some serious ventilation. The rooms smelt musty and mouldy and the bathroom wasn't very nice at all. They were mouldy and the water leaked on to the floor whenever you showered. The bathroom was a bath which provided a shower head above the bathtub, but the shower curtain had mould stains (of which looked as though someone had attempted to remove them, but without success). The room provided your own personal safe a chair and desk a tv with cable. Usual room service and air conditioning (which is where I think alot of the mould smell was coming from) My windows were very big, but I was unable to open them for security reasons - thus having to live with the mould smell. The doors and walls were very thin and I could hear almost everything that went on in the next room. Thank goodness only one person was in there for 2 days!! The hotel provided a pool, and gym which were very well maintained. I stayed at this hotel for 4days. The breakfast buffet served the same food everyday, but there was a wide selection of fresh fruits and cereals which was great. The hotel is a little far away from Orchard Road. You could walk there and it'd take you about 20mins but in the heat, you'd probably have a little more difficulty. The hotel did provide free transfers to Orchard Road and Little India though which I thought was fantastic. Overrall, it was an ok hotel, but the rooms were a little disappointing for the amount of money you pay.

Reviews.Title: “Not close to the city but hotel was very pleasant”
Reviews.Author: Caz069
Reviews.Content: This hotel is not close to the City, but a shuttle bus leaves every hour, through the day and night, the staff were pleasant, and friendly, l stayed in a twin room, which was a bit tight, the pool area is nice although the pool could do with an update. Breakfast area was spacious, and the food not bad'the tour agent was very helpful, l would stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Not too Bad”
Reviews.Author: BkkChai
Reviews.Content: I have to travel to Singapore on a very short notice and it was very difficult to get a room as most of the hotel was already 100% full or they were asking for prices that was too high. I booked the room through the hotel's website and the rate was SGD 195 excluding tax and service fee.. Trust me it was cheap when compared to what other hotels were offering. The hotel is about 10 mins from Orchard road and the taxi cost about SGD 6-8 per trip.. The hotel also offer free shuttle to ORCHARD road and the shuttle leaves every hour.. There is nothing nearby to the hotel.. but the room was quite nice and spacey.. I quite like the hotel.. The rate also includes Breakfast but I did not get up on time for it..

Reviews.Title: “Refurbishment Required”
Reviews.Author: shazam7
Reviews.Content: I would agree with other reviewers. The hotel is located in the middle of nowhere" and you really need to cab it or take the hotel bus shuttle to get anywhere. The rooms are badly in need of refurbishment. I would also agree with other reviewers' comments that the rooms are depressing. On a positive note, though, the rooms are reasonably clean and functional. Another good feature is the pond on the lobby level. Very pretty. I've also been told that the Chinese restaurant is good, but I personally did not try it. My advice is unless you get a very attractive rate, or if there's no other hotel, be very wary of this place.

Reviews.Title: “I liked it”
Reviews.Author: BudapestApu
Reviews.Content: I stayed there this July. I was literally afraid to go there after reading the so many negative impressions here. However, I have to say that only one negative point survived - the curtains really were not cleaned/changed since the inauguration of the hotel. But all personnel friendly and helpful, services ok, buffet style breakfasts and dinners meet every standard - wireless internet connection (in the lobby) working immediately and perfectly. I liked the swimming pool for relaxation. Could be opened one hour earlier, as the 7 a.m is too late for people who have to leave for business, and do not want to skip breakfast. Theoretically it is possible to eat at 6 and swim at 7, but this order is not too healthy... I also used the courtesy shuttle bus - it is exact to schedule (also returning), some 5 minutes from the center. in the night.

Reviews.Title: “Damp depressing room”
Reviews.Author: beachwalkers
Reviews.Content: This hotel looks good when entering but the room we had was simply awful. It was very basic with no views but the worst aspect was it very damp and felt wet. We paid $114 for a day stopover which was a waste of money as we could not bear to stay in the depressing room and so glad we were not staying the night. The restaurant was okay and the outside pool was fairly good..

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended!”
Reviews.Author: David-SriLanka
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 5 days during Week 3 of June 2007, the hotel is located out of the central orchard area, costs approx S$ 7-12 one way by taxi. I spent over $300 during the stay for taxis alone. The hotel provides a shuttle service but is not convenient. The room was reasonably clean but the toilet was NOT, there were small flies in the washroom which I thought was very un-hygienic. Further the staff was not friendly. Mini bar was empty...The resturant food was ok but not the best. I don't recommend this hotel..... :( Davinda from Sri Lanka

Reviews.Title: “Wasnt too bad”
Reviews.Author: pobuk
Reviews.Content: I arrived Christmas Day 2006 for a 2 night stopover on my way to Australia. I had booked a superior room which was very spacious and clean. The airline (Qantas) had lost my baggage so i arrived with nothing apart from a small amount of hand luggage. On arrival I informed the concierge of my baggage mishap and asked him to let me know if it was delivered, unfortunately this never happened during my stay and eventually turned up 5 days later in Australia! I found the hotel staff to be courteous and helpful and although the hotel is a little bit out from the hustle and bustle of Orchard Road, taxis were coming and going all day and night and it was very cheap to travel this way. The Hotel did provide a number of shuttle buses free of charge throughout the day and again I found these to be very clean, punctual and effificient. One disappointment was the pool which was next to a busy road and had a lot of leaves and debris in it and didnt look in the least bit inviting, having said that the sun never managed to break through the clouds during my brief stay and we did have a couple of brief heavy thunderstorms so sunbathing was out anyway. Overall I think I would stay here again as this hotel represented good value for money.
